channel.title: events on Fore Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in events on Fore Documentation

item.title: Events
item.description: Events Fore is an event-driven state-engine. It reacts to events and dispatches itself a lot of events to reflect it’s state. Lifecycle Events Lifecylce events can be used for initialization tasks. When Fore is loaded into the DOM of a web page it will dispatch the following sequence of events: Name Description target model-construct is not of much pratical use but just signals that Fore is alive fx-model model-construct-done fires after all fx-instance elements have initialized and the model is setup.
